attributes.action: Build The Severn Barrier and new London Island Airport now
attributes.additional_details:
In order to kick-start the economy and provide future growth and infrastructure capability the Government should commence construction of the Severn Barrier and new London Island Airport with immediate effect.

This would provide an immediate kick-start to the struggling construction industry, would ensure that airport capacity is in place to match future growth and would provide a sustainable energy solution to ease power concerns for future generations
